description: Alterations and extensions to existing building for operation as a multi-level leisure facility falling within the existing Class E use, including; third floor mansard roof extension above rear block, erection of plant room and creation of roof terrace to main roof, shopfront alterations, creation of new means of escape and enclosure of existing external staircase to the rear of the building, excavation work to basement level, erection of outbuildings to the rear to serve an external play area, new garden gates along Larches Avenue, external enclosure of a bike and buggy store and bin store to Larches Avenue and provision of DDA parking space and Loading Bay.
